name: Puzzle Tycoon Game
description:
Do you have great puzzle imagination? You will need it to solve puzzles now!
You’ll need to combine an image so that it becomes exactly the same as above name object. All objects are relevant items and they can be rotated as you wish and set it out what part you need. Think and take easy puzzle
FEATURE:
- Hundreds of puzzle with a lot of difficulty levels
- Free puzzle game to play
- Show hint for creating image and sticker puzzle
- Increase your imagination power paper game
- Adding 25 puzzles per week
HOW TO PLAY:
- Drag the pieces paper game to make a new object fun puzzle
- Try to match the suggested sticker puzzle object below.
- As soon as speed puzzle to 100 % , level will be clear.
- Sometimes you need to rotate the objects puzzle to make a master object.
Welcome to Puzzle Tycoon Game!!
publishers: SOFT VIET DEVELOPMENT TECHNOLOGY AND INVESTMENT COMPANY
